message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment that could significantly impact your life positively. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, I am offering it to you for $15000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your potential to benefit greatly from this product. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions.
